GERMANY XEN WINDOWS VPS   :
``````````````````````````````````````````````````````````````````````
Germany 100Mbps Windows VPS is powered with Xen-HVM and can be controlled through SolusVM Control Panel. This service is hardware based; you will find there will be no overselling of resource involved. All clients will be receiving dedicated resources for the Virtual Machines, giving 100% output for their requirements.

Quality VPS Service! For Affordable Price ...
With a XEN VPS, you get your own operating system with full administrator access to configure as you like, much the same as a fully dedicated server. Access your VPS with Remote Desktop Application.


Ready to get started? Select the Xen Windows VPS hosting plan that meets your needs. Which are available for you at verify affordable prices.
```````````````````````````````````````````````````````````````````````````````
